languages.text: {n}Внушительного мужчину, с ног до головы покрытого шрамами, трудно с кем-то спутать. Перед вами Капеллан, духовник Денза Беллардо, на чьих похоронах вы оказались, кажется, целую вечность назад. Скрестив руки на груди, он мрачно обводит взглядом зал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Внушительного мужчину, с ног до головы покрытого шрамами, трудно с кем-то спутать. Перед вами Капеллан, духовник Дэнза Беллардо, на чьих похоронах вы волею судеб оказались, как вам кажется, целую вечность назад. Скрестив руки на груди, он мрачно обводит взглядом зал.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Внушительного мужчину, с ног до головы покрытого шрамами, трудно с кем-то спутать. Перед вами Капеллан, духовник Денза Беллардо, на чьих похоронах вы оказались, кажется, целую вечность назад. Скрестив руки на груди, он мрачно обводит взглядом зал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You're looking at the Chaplain, father confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral seems like an eternity ago now. His arms are crossed as he surveys the hall with a gloomy expression.{/n}

{n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

{n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前这个男人威风凛凛，从头到脚满是伤疤。你绝不会认错这个人，他正是“牧师”，已故的丹兹·贝拉多的告解神父，丹兹的葬礼已经结束很久了。牧师插着双臂，表情阴郁地看着房间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这个男人威风凛凛，从头到脚满是伤疤。你绝不会认错这个人，他正是“牧师”，已故的丹兹·贝拉多的告解神父，丹兹的葬礼已经结束很久了。牧师插着双臂，表情阴郁地看着大厅。{/n}

languages.text: {n}頭からつま先まで傷だらけの印象的な男は、決して人違いされる事はないだろう。教戒官は、故デンツ・ベラルドの聴罪司祭だ。ベラルドの葬儀も、遠くの昔に開催されたような印象を受ける。腕を組んだ教戒官は、暗い表情で部屋を見渡していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}頭からつま先まで傷だらけの印象的な男は、決して人違いされる事はないだろう。教戒官は、故デンツ・ベラルドの聴罪司祭だ。ベラルドの葬儀も、遠くの昔に開催されたような印象を受ける。腕を組んだ教戒官は、暗い表情でホールを見渡していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es difícil confundir con otra persona al imponente hombre cubierto de cicatrices de la cabeza a los pies. Se trata del Capellán, confesor del difunto Denz Bellardo, cuyo funeral parece haber sido hace ya una eternidad. Tiene los brazos cruzados y observa la sala con expresión sombría.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil confundir con otra persona al imponente hombre cubierto de cicatrices de la cabeza a los pies. Se trata del Capellán, padre confesor del difunto Denz Bellardo, cuyo funeral parece haber sido hace ya una eternidad. Tiene los brazos cruzados y observa la sala con expresión sombría.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der imposante Mann, der von Kopf bis Fuß mit Narben übersät ist, ist schwer zu verwechseln. Du hast den Ordenspriester vor dir, den Beichtvater des verstorbenen Denz Bellardo, dessen Begräbnis eine Ewigkeit her zu sein scheint. Der Ordenspriester blickt mit verschränkten Armen und düsterer Miene durch den Raum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der imposante Mann, der von Kopf bis Fuß mit Narben übersät ist, ist schwer zu verwechseln. Du hast den Ordenspriester vor dir, den Beichtvater des verstorbenen Denz Bellardo, dessen Begräbnis eine Ewigkeit her zu sein scheint. Der Ordenspriester blickt mit verschränkten Armen und düsterer Miene durch die Halle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Impossible de vous méprendre sur l'identité de cet homme imposant, couvert de cicatrices des pieds à la tête : il s'agit de Chapelain, père confesseur de feu Denz Bellardo dont les funérailles vous semblent remonter à une éternité. Les bras croisés, il observe la salle d'un air sombre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Impossible de vous méprendre sur l'identité de cet homme imposant, couvert de cicatrices des pieds à la tête : il s'agit de Chapelain, père confesseur de feu Denz Bellardo dont les funérailles vous semblent remonter à une éternité. Les bras croisés, il observe la salle d'un air sombre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tepeden tırnağa yara izleriyle kaplı, haşmetli adamı bir başkasıyla karıştırmak imkânsız. Karşındaki kişi, ölümünün ve cenazesinin üzerinden yıllar geçmiş gibi hissettiğin Denz Bellardo'nun günah çıkaranı Papaz. Kollarını kavuşturmuş hâlde, kasvetli bir yüz ifadesiyle odayı gözlemliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The imposing man covered head to toe in scars is hard to mistake for anyone else. You are looking at Chaplain, confessor to the late Denz Bellardo, whose funeral now seems like an eternity ago. His arms are crossed as he surveys the room with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tepeden tırnağa yara izleriyle kaplı, haşmetli adamı bir başkasıyla karıştırmak imkânsız. Karşındaki kişi, ölümünün ve cenazesinin üzerinden yıllar geçmiş gibi hissettiğin Denz Bellardo'nun günah çıkaranı Papaz. Kollarını kavuşturmuş hâlde, kasvetli bir yüz ifadesiyle odayı gözlemliyor.{/n}
